title: Quest For Glory Collection ( All 5 Games,2 Remakes,And Launcher)
description:
The Quest For Glory Collection by Sierra On-line

Includes

Quest For Glory 1 So You Want To Be A Hero (EGA) A.k.a Hero Quest (Typing Interface)
Quest For Glory 1 So You Want To Be A Hero(VGA) (Point and Click Interface)
Quest For Glory 2 Trial By Fire(EGA)(Typing Interface)
Quest For Glory 2 Trial By Fire(VGA style) by AGDInteractive (Point and Click)
Quest For Glory 3 Wages Of War (Point and Click)
Quest For Glory 4 Shadows Of Darkness (Point and Click)
Quest For Glory 5 Dragon Fire (Point and Click)

Comes with a Launcher Program that uses DOSBOX to run the older games.
Also Great work by the guys at AGDInteracive for their Remake of 
Quest For Glory 2 Trial By Fire.  Great Game.


No Need for Install
Just run the Sierra Launcher and pick your poison and have a great time
playing some of the greatest games of all time.

Enjoy

      Billetwound
